ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: Got an invite last night - a friend of a friend s Guild (hehehe no kidding) had been there for a while doing respawns and needed to rotate in some warm bodies
ygData.messageBody:
Got an invite last night - a friend of a friend's Guild (hehehe no kidding)
had been there for a while doing respawns and needed to rotate in some warm
bodies as people were logging. When I got there to my chagrin discovered
that the Rapier and a BP rotted earlier in the day ARRRRG! No armor dropped
(we got two banshees and they dropped nada) but we took down Maestro (he was
tough seemed to have a lot more HP's than the last time I fought him). He
dropped me an Evensong as well as a lute and the Hand. The sad thing - a
lot of people died (they rez'd me right away) - and the Maestro poofed
before they could lotto the Hand. I was trying to see if Darkfox could get
up to get the lute - but we were still talking about it when it poofed.

Verant really needs to make sure ALL Epic mobs are on a 30-minute not a
5-minute timer (Darkfox and I are guessing when they upped the poof time
it's for 55+ mobs or some such)

QUESTION: The stats on the Evensong are 11/25 1HB Range 50 (Not so uber
compared to many Kunark and Velious Item). What the heck does the Range 50
mean for this type of weapon?

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 8:58 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Hate

Well the guild im in is planning to go up to hate this week. But this
weekend i got an invite from a friend that was allready in hate so i figured
i'd gate up early....

Friday night: was allready empty zone practically (1-2 mobs on track) when i
got there, my friend's guild was in maestro hall, we proceeded to pull the
area, another bard logged in (that was in his guild) she got a helm and
martune rapier. I have no complaints though, my group was the xp group once
i started chanting, made almost a full bub. Got tired afterwards, had to get
some shut eye...

Saturday morning: join up with another guild up there, 2 other bards in
zone, one of which had a full suit, other had bp/arms/gloves. The one that
needed pieces went LD just before we pull a banshee, never came back, i got
boots.

Sunday morning: join up with yet another guild up there, kill a couple
mobs, 2 cr's later and 2 banshees, i got myself a bp woot!

All in all i guess im a lucky bard in hate so far, even won a lotto on a
ruby crown (money money money). Only thing i really care to get from the
zone now is legs and lute and maybe a diamond if i'm really lucky, and maybe
a martune rapier would be nice in offhand. I really cant complain, so far
with this char my hate experience has been quite positive

Wonder what i'll get this week 8)

Minkin
lev 48 bard
Ayonae Ro


--- In eqbards@y..., Rebecca Small <rsmall@c...> wrote:
> Strangely enough, I've spent only one full day in Hate. I was the
only bard
> all day as I recall. I got the boots, BP and a Martune rapier. I've
only
> been back once for just a few hours, it was mostly clean and we
just went to
> lend a hand to the crew finishing up after some folks had to camp.
No bard
> stuff dropped either time from the Maestro.
>
> Oh btw, I've found wisps really really hate clerics. I haven't seen
the like
> since they turned down bard hate. Twice last night in WC my L10
cleric was
> ganged by wisps. I started on one, another dove in when the first
was mostly
> dead, then it was about dead a third and then a fourth jumped in! I
only saw
> the one wisp when I started the fight. I had to run. Later, I
started on
> another one and in about 2 minutes, I had five live wisps chase me
to the
> zoneline after I killed the first one! Have you ever seen a wisp
train? I
> had zoned in and out between fights so there couldn't have been any
leftover
> aggro.
>
> Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
> Excalibur, Xegony
